# resume()

**Instance Method**

Resumes object tracking algorithms after [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/pause()] is called.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func resume()
```

## Discussion

Call this method when the object capture view first appears on the screen, or after `pause()` is called to show another view temporarily.

## Controlling the session

- **cancel()**: Requests that the capture session be canceled.
- **finish()**: Requests that the capture session be stopped and all data saved.
- **pause()**: Pauses the automatic capture and other resource-intense algorithms.
- **requestImageCapture()**: Requests a manual image capture.
- **startCapturing()**: Begins taking images for object capture.
